message: Fix: Structural fix for ChatViewModel.kt to resolve build environment issues
Fix: Remove 'private' from broadcast helpers to fix GitHub Actions build error
Fix: Robust message handling in ChatViewModel.kt to resolve silent chat issue
Fix: Downgrade SettingsRepository to standard SharedPreferences for reliable token loading on service startup (to resolve 1008 error)
Fix: Explicit WebSocket connection on session start (attempt to solve token persistence issue)
